overview: Froilan has twelve years experience building technology startups and built and managed the infrastructure of CAD Sciences, a medical imaging software startup acquired by iCAD (NASDAQ: ICAD) in 2008. He has a Masters of Science in Information Systems from New York University (a joint program of Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences and Stern Business school). Froilan is also an adjunct professor at Monroe College teaching UNIX/Linux, Perl and Programming Logic in C++.
